name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with extensive experience in delivering scalable and reliable backend solutions using **PHP**, **Go**, and **RESTful** services. Skilled in **Domain Driven Design**, **Unit Testing**, and **Integration Testing** to ensure high code quality and maintainability. Proficient in deploying solutions on **AWS**, utilizing **AWS SQS** for efficient messaging. Recognized for applying innovative strategies across various industries, including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, while consistently focusing on robust architecture and efficient code practices.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained **RESTful** APIs for a microservices architecture, enhancing system integration and ensuring robust functionality with a focus on **Domain Driven Design**.
Implemented comprehensive **Unit Testing** and **Integration Testing** strategies to ensure high code quality and system reliability, achieving a 95% pass rate across test cases.
Utilized **AWS SQS** to improve messaging reliability between services, contributing to a **40%** increase in data processing efficiency.
Designed and optimized backend services using **PHP** and **Go**, demonstrating strong performance improvements with response times reduced by **30%**.
Collaborated on system architecture enhancements to ensure scalability, resulting in a 99.9% system uptime in production environments.
Integrated continuous deployment processes using AWS, achieving deployment times reduced by **80%** and improving delivery efficiency.
Effectively utilized **Cloud** services to optimize resource management and minimize operational costs, ensuring a well-architected framework.

Utilized **PHP** and **Go** to develop backend services, enhancing system performance and processing speed.
Implemented **RESTful** APIs adhering to **Domain Driven Design** principles, resulting in a user-friendly and scalable architecture.
Conducted **Unit Testing** and **Integration Testing**, maintaining a 95% code coverage across multiple application components.
Deployed applications in a **Cloud** environment using **AWS SQS**, achieving improved message delivery times by 30%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline development processes, reducing project turnaround times by 20%.

Developed backend RESTful APIs using **PHP** and **Go**, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Engineered solutions utilizing **AWS** services including **AWS SQS** for seamless message queuing and management.
Executed comprehensive **Unit Testing** and **Integration Testing** strategies to enhance application reliability by 30%.
Applied **Domain Driven Design** principles for efficient software architecture, resulting in a more maintainable codebase.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams to integrate cloud services, ensuring streamlined deployments and operations.

skills:

	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin, PHP
